name: Sniper training camp
description: 《Sniper training camp》is a gun training shooting game. The game is designed to help the game player to practice reaction speed and hitting rate, game player to the in vivo target characters appear on the screen of the fast shot in the game, this is the test of the reaction speed and the game player hand speed, all kinds of guns and red dot, 2, 4, 8, holographic, 15 times the sight of match used in training under different environment on the use of guns, so it's good exercise in game player encounter opponents play FPS games will not hurry.
